title: Accurate modeling of the potential energy surface of atmospheric molecular clusters boosted by neural networks
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, 3,1438-1451
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00255E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jakub Kubečka, Daniel Ayoubi, Zeyuan Tang, Yosef Knattrup, Morten Engsvang, Haide Wu, Jonas Elm
We present the application of machine learning methods to alleviate the computational cost of quantum chemistry calculations required for modeling atmospheric molecular clusters.
